name: MIS Prisoner Pay Breakdown Report
description:
Report displays Prisoners and their pay breakdown for a date range specified at run time.
FIN0080- v00.00.01 Date Modified 05/02/2019

dataset.name: Payroll Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS NOMS_NUMBER FROM (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **'), CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN 'Session' ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, SUM(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_AMOUNT), SUM(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PIECE_WORK), SUM(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.BONUS_PAY) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ID (+) AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.ACTIVITY_DATE_SK = AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PAY_TYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION IN ('Offender Payroll', 'Payroll', 'Earnings', 'Earnings - Spends') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-05-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('07-05-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y')) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **'), CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN 'Session' ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **'), CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN 'Session' ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN -AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT END) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ID (+) AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.ACTIVITY_DATE_SK = AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PAY_TYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION IN ('Offender Payroll', 'Payroll', 'Earnings', 'Earnings - Spends') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-05-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('07-05-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y')) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **'), CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN 'Session' ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT NOMS_NUMBER, CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_DETAILS___PAY_DESCRIPTION IS NULL THEN 'No Information' ELSE TRANSACTION_DETAILS___PAY_DESCRIPTION END AS V_TDPD, CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_DETAILS___ACTIVITY_DATE IS NULL THEN 'No Information' ELSE TRANSACTION_DETAILS___ACTIVITY_DATE END AS V_ACTIVITY_DATE, CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION = 'Earnings' THEN TRANSACTION_AMOUNT_CRDR ELSE TRANSACTION_DETAILS___PAY_AMOUNT END AS V_PAY_AMOUNT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_TDPD
field.legacySql: = If IsNull([Transaction Details - Pay Description]) Then "No Information" Else [Transaction Details - Pay Description]

field.name: $ref:V_ACTIVITY_DATE
field.legacySql: = If IsNull([Transaction Details - Activity Date]) Then "No Information" Else [Transaction Details - Activity Date]

field.name: $ref:V_PAY_AMOUNT
field.legacySql: =If [Transaction Type Description]="Earnings" Then [Transaction Amount CR/DR] Else [Transaction Details - Pay Amount]
